Pre-Game Insights: The Nuggets are the best team in the Western Conference with 19.8 fast break points led by Christian Braun averaging 5.0.
The Clippers are fourth in the Western Conference, allowing only 107.9 points and holding opponents to 45.9% shooting.
Nikola Jokic is averaging 31.5 points, 13 rebounds, 9.7 assists, and 1.7 steals for the Nuggets.
James Harden is scoring 21.6 points per game with 6.1 rebounds and 8.0 assists for the Clippers.
